title: (x) The Empire Strikes Back daybill - ITC Avant Garde Gothic {Brad B, Yves}
content:
Anyone know this one?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071023082002im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ESB.gif)

 [‹ Lead face to digital font translation help](http://web.archive.org/web/20071023082002/http:/typophile.com/node/18326 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Mojo magazine nameplate and headlines - Metro (Geometric 415), Lithos {Nick Curtis, Stephen, Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071023082002/http:/typophile.com/node/18322 "Go to next forum topic")
author: kiarostami

comments.content: It looks like [Avant Garde](http://web.archive.org/web/20071023082002/http:/www.identifont.com/find?font=avant+garde&q=Find). Not sure which one, but it’s one of the lighter weights. I’m not sure if this exact one is in digital form or not, but there’s bound to be something close.
